dialog_context: ['I recently remembered a sweet memory of my aunt who recently passed away.', 'what was it?', 'She would give hundreds of dollars of school supplies to kids in need each year.', "wow, that's an amazing woman. did she rub off on you any?", 'She did! I fill stockings around the holidays and go around on Christmas giving them out to people who have to work. :)', 'It sounds like your aunt was an amazing woman.']
modified_text: Amazingly selfish, nobody besides herself ever spent a penny on her.

dialog_context: ['About to open a restaurant with my friend. I hope it goes well.', 'Oh yeah? What is going to be your hallmark meal?', 'I have to think about that, not sure yet. Any suggestions?', "i don't know... maybe pizza?", 'Yeah! why not. It is not that hard and I have done it in the past. thanks', 'what kind of restaurant do you want?', 'I want a place that has both outdoors and indoors option and with live music.']
modified_text: That is good to hear a night would enjoy some great music with me.

dialog_context: ['what do you do for fun? i love long weekend hikes myself', 'i go hunt for the best lobster.', 'Neat I love lobster but cant afford it', "That's why I try to catch my own! What do you do in your free time?", 'In my free time I do a lot of reading', 'Nice! Reading is so relaxing.', 'yes. I get to read for fun now instead of studying all the time', 'I do love to read as well. What did you study?', 'Public Relations', 'Thats cool. I went to school for computer science.', 'Did you join any clubs while you were there?', 'No, I had to focus on my degree. Did you join any clubs?']
modified_text: Yes, I joined the journalism major club because it helped with my TV production and I rather dislike print media like books and reading.

dialog_context: ["I didn't realize it was that large. Have you seen The Wolf of Wallstreet?", 'Yeah I have, it was really good. It was set near Broadway and the South Street.', "I agree, it's a great movie. Leonardo DiCaprio is a great actor and handsome too, lol.", 'He is a very great actor. I also like him in Gangs of New York.', "Oh, I've never seen that, but I have heard of it! I'll have to watch it. I don't watch a lot of movies, but I want to watch more.", "You should watch it. It's a great movie. What do you like to do?", 'Well, I work a lot, but when I get home I like to spend time with my dog and take walks.', 'That sounds like a good way to have fun and get some exercise! I also have two dogs. What kind of dog do you have?']
modified_text: She's a very smart breed! They're a poodle. What about you?

dialog_context: ['milk makes strong bones though, how do you supplement your diet?', "i'm vegetarian. you can get all your nutrition from plants, you know?", 'Is it possible to be buff being a vegetarian?', 'I wouldn\'t know, I\'m hardly "buff" but feel healthy!', 'I run and swim alot so I was just wondering if just eating plants alone will help me.', 'Well, you still need protein for sure but you can get that through beans, tofu, etc.', "Wow I honestly did not know tofu had any protein. What's your favorite dish?", 'I love all veggies so I often do a stir fry and spice it up with some chiles.', 'That sounds very good! I need to try that out one day. How can I make it?', "I don't use a recipe; just heat some OVO and quickly cook the veggies. I like them still crunchy. Add spices as desired.", 'What is OVO?']
modified_text: Cashews or walnuts. If you like olive oil, they are a good source of protein too. Just add some nuts!

dialog_context: ['It makes me think of the good old days when I was a kid when I listen to the music in my aunts car', 'What does? Were you in a car ride with your aunt?', 'felling the wind on my face when i run', "I can see how that could be soothing if you didn't get motion sickness", 'do you run /', 'I love running, but it needs to be in the right area. You?', "it's my enjoyment, my stress reliever.", 'That is a great stress reliever. How far do you normally run?', 'bout 4 miles easy, i like to run when its cool and windy', 'Wow. I only make it about a mile, mile and a half. When I have time.', 'its all in the mind, once you can believe it you can do it', 'yeah but too much running makes me so tired and I hate that.']
modified_text: It gets me very sweaty when I like to run in the warmth.

dialog_context: ['going near hights really makes me scared', 'Did a specific experience cause this? or just instinct.']
modified_text: just instinct I think heights have always made me afraid

dialog_context: ['hi', 'You should read the instructions before you start.. You need to work off the prompts.. But hello,', "ughhhh i was proud that i graduated but i don't do anything with my degree", "Well you should be proud of graduating. Why didn't you do anything with your degree?", 'Because whenever I get an interview they always say "we decided to move forward with someone else". It\'s too much work to keep going to those stupid interviews anyways.', "Well you will never get in if you don't keep trying? What are you doing instead?", "Just watching Shark Tank. They have it so easy. I just have to think of something that'll sell and then I'll never have to work!", 'Well that seems like a lot of work and a little risky but I am sure you can think of a good idea', "I know right? It's why I can't think of anything. I wish that I was more imaginative and could think of something. What do you watch?", 'well I like Naked and afraid but I would never do the show. I have problems with interviews too when they see my hair', "OMG that's so much work. And what's wrong with your hair? I bet you have nicer hair than me though"]
modified_text: Really? Blue and orange is my hair right now.

dialog_context: ['I put in a job application for a new job. I am fairly certain that my credentials are enough to get me the job.', 'Thats awesome! Have you been scheduled for an interview yet?', 'I was, I go in next Tuesday. I am pretty excited for them to give me the job.', 'I would be too! I hope everything goes well with it!', "Thanks. I'm ready to go to work right now!"]
modified_text: You bet I don't get it.

dialog_context: ["Have you ever heard of Dylan's Candy Bar? It's a great candy shop that started in New York, and now is in different cities.", 'I have heard about it. I bet it has delicious treats. Who started it?', 'It was actually started by Dylan Lauren, the daughter of the American fashion designer Ralph Lauren.', "That's interesting. I wonder what gave her the idea to start it?", "I don't know for the candy part, but the entrepreneur side has to come from her father!"]
modified_text: Anyways, never heard of the small chain. It must be it.

dialog_context: ['I went to the store for sodas and it ended up being a rough trip.', 'Ut oh.. what happened?']
modified_text: My money dropped while I was holding too much, I ran into the door, and a 2 liter sent the bag busting through the parking lot. And of course a lot of people saw it.

dialog_context: ['No, but I do like sci-fi style games. What else do you know about this interesting game?', "It's set 200 years after humans colonized Mars, during what's known as the War of Water. Seems pretty interesting to me.", 'Yes. That is very interesting.', 'Do you enjoy video games?', 'Oh Yes.', 'I love video games.', 'I also like video games.', 'Which platform do you use? ie. the electronic system used to play video games.', 'I use to playstation.', 'old or new version? i love playing on both. did you get the new old system?', "I've had both the new and the old one. Is there one you prefer over the other?"]
modified_text: The old one is what I like, but I haven't tried the new one yet.

dialog_context: ['Once I ate a raw oyster because my uncle offered me some and I contracted food poisoning. Things were coming out from both ends, so gross.', 'Did you get sick afterwards', 'Extremely, but it passed after a day or so. Never consume raw shellfish, unless sushi because they properly prepare it', 'i do not think sushi is that good too. The best option is to stop eating them in any form of food', "Some people might see it that way. I've never gotten sick from sushi though, so I will continue eating it."]
modified_text: I eat all sorts of raw shellfish too. I eat sushi, it's totally safe.

dialog_context: ['Over the summer my family went to Alabama to visit family and I felt a lot of emotions', "I guess you don't live in Alabama? Was it overall a good trip....or challenging? Or both!", 'No, I do not live in Alabama. We drove and trip was overall very good as sometimes it can be challenging when driving such a long distance', "Well, if the drive was the most challenging it sounds like a good trip! Too often it's family dynamics that are *more* challenging -- and not so easily taken care of. ;-)"]
modified_text: A plane just took us, it wasn't challenging, quicker that way.

dialog_context: ['I have heard that you can set your clock using the geyser.', 'I never knew that, interesting. It was established by Ulysses S. Grant in 1872!', 'Really? That has been around for awhile then.', "Yeah isn't that crazy. I love geysers. Have you ever seen one in person?", "One time I was in a large group of people but couldn't get a very good look because of all the tall people in front of me.", "Oh no! I am pretty tall so I don't have that problem. Except everyone looks at me funny in public.", 'But, you can always grab things off the top shelf. That is a challenge for me!']
modified_text: It is a challenge for taller people too. I am so short, seems like everything was made for me.

dialog_context: ["My dad was a big fan of Guns N' Roses, they're a hard rick band that was from Los Angeles.", 'They are a great band i think welcome to the jungle is their best song', 'I\'m pretty unfamiliar with them, the only song of their\'s that i really know is Sweet Child o\' Mine", which was their only single to reach #1 on the Hot 100.', 'That is a great song as well. who is their singer again?', 'Their lead singer is Axl Rose, while their lead guitarist is Slash.', 'slash is great! i love his solos', 'Yeah he sounds a bit more familiar to me. HE released 3 solo albums "Slash," "Apocalyptic Love", and "World on Fire." All since 2010.', "Those albums are all classic's, I remember the first time hearing all three."]
modified_text: I am not too familiar with the sound, I wouldn't be able to tell the guitarist Slash.

dialog_context: ["My boyfriend's best friend is a female.", 'Does that bother you?', 'No not at all, I have plenty of male friends', 'I think that is a good thing.', "Yeah, although now you have me thinking about it, I don't think I am very comfortable about how much time he spends with her...", 'I can see why that would bother you.', 'haha yeah, so how about you, do you have a partner?', 'Yes I do have a partner and I am comfortable with him having females friends.', "That's great to hear. What's your favorite activity to do with him?", 'We enjoy watching movies together.']
modified_text: That sounds nice. A partner to watch movies with, I wish I had.

dialog_context: ['Yeah about 10 years ago I had a horrifying experience. It was 100% their fault but they hit the water barrels and survived. They had no injuries but they almost ran me off the road.', 'Did you suffer any injuries?', "No I wasn't hit. It turned out they were drunk. I felt guilty but realized it was his fault.", "Why did you feel guilty? People really shouldn't drive drunk.", 'I feel guilty as I got badly injured as well']
modified_text: Minor drinks are ok to drive under if you are confident.

dialog_context: ['Do you like Nickelback? What can you tell me about him so I can be convinced to listen to his songs?', "I used to like Nickelback but they haven't done anything worth it in many years.", "Really? isn't that a good thing. modified_text: The group has Chad Kroeger as its leading vocalist.

dialog_context: ['it can be tough. got to stay strong though.', "i couldn't figure it out. math is just to hard.", 'I agree! Math is way too hard. If you need help you can always ask though!', "That's true. What are you studying math for?", 'I had to take some math classes to finish my nursing degree. I only took them because they were mandatory though. Why are you studying math?', "I'm hoping to go into engineering. So I better improve my math! Don't want to be serving tables forever.", "You can do it! I'm more of an athlete. I have travelled lots for competitions which was great. Have you travelled anywhere?", 'Last year, I went to Belarus. It was really interesting, the country is almost lost in time. Have you ever been to Eastern Europe?', 'Yes i were there last year']
modified_text: oh great there would also go I I'd never been there

dialog_context: ['And who would be the most successful producer?', 'Probably Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc.', 'I agree. No, I am not talented enough to be in the music business either.", 'What are you talented in?', 'Im mostly talented at sports']
modified_text: You don't want to know at I'm talented in

dialog_context: ["Winter is the best time of year. The cold crisp air. The blanket of snow on the farm land. Don't you agree?", "I don't agree! I hate winter- it's the coldest season, and where I live, there is usually so much snow. Yuck!", "I'm from Colorado so I know about snow. My city gets an average to 10-12 feet a year. If you hate it why not move?", "You would see a lot of snow! Moving is not so easy, I'm Canadian, and when it is winter, it is winter in the whole country.", 'Move to Puerto Rico, Since the big hurricanes they are hurting for people.', "I've never been to Puerto Rico, but I'm not sure I could get a visa. It's tempting- but aren't they still without electricity in many regions?", "It's a quite troubled place to be honest."]
modified_text: Good electricity is there. It's very nice.

dialog_context: ['So I managed to get all my school shopping done this week so the kids have all their things ready to go for tomorrow!', 'Cool I just finished today', "I got an early start this year. Most years I start late and they're out of stuff I need by the time I get around to it.", 'Yeah we had a hard time today lol', 'And then the stores get so crowded after a certain point!', 'I am going to do like you next year for sure!', "It's always good to plan ahead."]
modified_text: Anything for school hasn't even been bought by me yet.

dialog_context: ['I had been studying so hard for a test and was very confident going in.', 'How did it go?', "I don't know, yet. I know a lot, about a lot of things, so I probably did good on it.", 'Sounds like you should do fine. Where are you from?', "Florida. It's finally getting cooler here. Where are you from?", 'Originally from Moscow. Now I live in Minnesota', 'Moscow! Really? So do you speak Russian?', 'Yes. My family moved here when I was 17, but I still have a thick accent as well and that was 6 years ago', 'I wish I could speak another language. I can do a lot of things, but I never got the hang of speaking a foreign language.', 'Yes. English was hard for me to pick up. How old are you?', "62. I've heard English is a hard language to learn."]
modified_text: The midwestern dialect was the hard part for me to learn. You're the same age as my father.

dialog_context: ['I was supposed to go for brunch with my friend Maria the other day. At least that was the plan.', "Why didn't you go?"]
modified_text: Well, she had initially agreed to meet at 11. Wouldn't you know it, my text didn't end up returning her until 3PM!

dialog_context: ["Be aggressive! Be Be aggressive! That's my favorite cheer!", 'Haha! That is pretty cool. I think I would be good at chanting slogans, but not the intense physical activity!', "I've been cheering for the last 5 years, the stunts are my favorite part of cheer.", 'Have you been in any cheer competitions or do you normally cheer for sports teams?', 'I cheer for a sports team when I was younger my squad went to several cheer competitions.', 'That is cool! My niece went to Cheer Athletics in TX. It is the largest cheerleading program in the US. I was very proud of her.']
modified_text: Wow that's awesome, kudos to Cheer Athletics in TX!

dialog_context: ['I recently joined a group to help me lose weight. I have so much respect and admire everyone in that group so much.', 'Good luck! My sister-in-law has been with weight watchers for a while now. She loves the camaraderie and how everyone encourages each other.']
modified_text: Their support has really helped. For them, I am so grateful.

dialog_context: ['do you nap often then', 'i do. i have to get up early to catch my bus to school.', 'I have to get up early too, I wish I had time to nap.', 'Exactly. It is often a time where you can get work done or just rest.', 'Yes for sure! What are you taking in school?', "Well I'm in high school so I'm just taking the normal required classes in order to graduate.", "Oh that makes sense, what's your favorite class? I always liked Biology.", 'I really liked chemistry because it allowed me to really try and understand life at a small level.', 'I never actually took chemistry, but that is very interesting to know. Are you graduating this year?', 'Yes, I will be graduating in May.']
modified_text: Oh that's fantastic! After graduation, what are your plans?

dialog_context: ["i like you... i'm going to have to look that one up.", 'thank you! need to appreciate and never take life for granted', "that's really hard for me right now", 'sometimes you just need to take a break and go find a peaceful place to sit and think.', "I know that, but whenever I get to thinking, I just can't figure out who I am", "some people never achieve that, don't get down on yourself.", 'I used to know, but now I just feel lost and disconnected from everything', "That's how i felt when my dog died. maybe you could get a pet", 'My husband and I are afraid of the responsibility', "that's true they are a lot of responsibility. maybe a snake?", 'What if I forget to feed it?', 'snakes can go weeks without eating.']
modified_text: Live rats might be the perfect pet for me. Is it true that they eat snakes?

dialog_context: ['I spent all weekend alone, wish my family lived closer.', 'i know what you mean. my family is 800 miles away']
modified_text: It's tough, my family over 2, 000 miles away is in Alaska!

modified_text: sure it is! why is madonna hiding from you?

dialog_context: ["Chocolate makes people happy, don't you agree?", "I think Chocolate is a key to happiness! It's so sweet, those roasted cacao seeds are a blessing for us.", 'We have a chocolate factory in the town where i leave. I think it feeds my love of chocolate.', 'Have you ever had the seeds from the cacao tree? Before they are processed they are pretty bitter and are fermented before being processed into chocolate.', 'No I have not. Where do you purchase them?', 'they came to argentina where i am from and i met them in a drugstore.', 'You met who in a drugstore?', 'Sorry, I got the cacao seeds there.', "Ah I see. I've never seen them in a drug store around here. I will ask my twin sister though. She works at a drug store.", "If you can't find them locally, you can always find them online.", "That's a good idea. I do a lot of shopping on amazon. Have you started Christmas shopping yet?", 'No, but I need to get started. Have you?']
modified_text: Yeah, I'm buying a gift for chocolate for someone else since I hate someone else.

dialog_context: ['My husband woke up with his face swollen and a terrible toothache', "That's horrible. Did he get to go to the dentist yet?"]
modified_text: Not yet, but the bedside nurse was I all day. Anything needed by him I was sure to get.

dialog_context: ['hey how are you doing?', 'tired man, been standing all day at the pumps. what about you?', 'you work at a gas station? i had a long day of teaching', 'new job, i do not think it will work. you teach kids?', 'that does now sound fun. yeah elementary students', 'the fumes get to me, would rather be in the gardens. hungry?', 'do you have a garden. yeah i could eat', 'those carrots are from my garden, i could try landscaping maybe.', 'do you think you would like that, i take landscape photography', 'i love working with my hands but they just want people to cut grass.', "That's interesting I don't know anything about landscape work."]
modified_text: I don't really like to do any other hard labor, only grass I cut.

dialog_context: ['Hi, my wife took me paragliding yesterday!', 'Wow, where did you do that?', 'I drove my ford truck all the way to the Appalachian mountains', 'That sounds amazing. The appalachian mountains are a place that i would like to go and paint.', 'I am going there to go camping next week. It should be a fun time.', 'I camp alot. I take my watercolours with me and paint all the beautiful things I see. Where else do you camp?', 'I have been to many places to camp, but usually just the mountains. I have been camping in the mountains with all 3 of my wives.', 'The mountains are such a beautiful place to camp. I love the blue of the sky above the mountains, it is my favourite colour.']
modified_text: Yes the sunset can be quite pretty. I like more the sky's orange.

dialog_context: ['I love riding my bike in the mountains near my house.', 'Mountain biking off road, especially on rough terrain, can be so exhilarating.', 'Yes it is! It really makes me feel alive. I love speeding down hills and seeing how fast I can go!', "Have you done freeriding? It's similar to mountain biking, but you mostly go downhill and work on jumping and tricks and such.", "No I haven't tried that at all. I haven't done any sort of trick biking. I think it would be pretty cool though.", 'Have you been to British Columbia? Biking is really popular there.', 'Not yet but I actually was planning a trip there this summer. I guess I can check out the biking scene first hand!', 'The pacific northwest is such a nice place to visit. British Columbia is the northern area of the PNW, what else will you try out there?', "I know they're well known for mountains and nice weather. I just want to stroll around and check out the scenerary.", "That's awesome, I promise you will love British Columbia."]
modified_text: I know, British Columbia has been visited by me many times before.

dialog_context: ["You just can't trust people any more. My mechanic told me it was going to be $1000 to fix my Jeep.", 'Wow that sounds pretty high to me. What was wrong with it?', 'Turns out, nothing much at all. A guy down the street got it running for $100.', 'Wow what a crook that other guy was!', 'Yeah, I guess the real money is in repair shops.']
modified_text: Well, that much money really isn't $1000 dollars.

dialog_context: ['Hi there, know of any good Guns N Roses songs?', 'I love WElcome to the Jungel. How about you?', 'November Rain is a good one for me', 'Sweet Child O mine is another good one.', "Can you believe that song makes Slash sick? or at least that's what he said in 1990", "That's crazy! What is Slash's favorite song?", "I'm not sure what his favorite song is, but he has released three solow albums", 'Oh, cool. Which one is your favorite?']
modified_text: Definitely the best is his fourth solo album.

dialog_context: ['My last relationship seemed to going so well until she basically flat out ghosted me.', 'Sorry dude, thats rough. Do you know why she did that?', "No idea. I didn't deserve that.", 'No one deserves that for no reason. How are you dealing with it?', "I'll get over it. I keep busy. Like soon, I have to go pick up my little sister. She's in the first grade.", 'Kids are a great way to keep your mind off of things! Little sisters can be company to go out and adventure with.']
modified_text: Yeah, I wish a little sister had me to help her cope and support her.

dialog_context: ['Hello. i would like to introduce myself. i own a marketing Consulting firm. are you familiar with my profession?', "I am indeed. You're a business of one or more experts that provide advice for a fee!", 'Yes, but sometimes our ads have capital letters in the wrong places, so we are a discount marketing agency.', 'I hear that and we know how important advertising is for selling a product, service or idea.', 'Yes, we are a full service firm: consulting, ad agency, production studios, sweepstakes and fulfillment. It is quite a lucrative business for us.', 'Outsourcing is important for marketing firms as well.', "You are correct! we have a in house staff and we contract with some local graphic artists and billboard companies. I'm sure you have seen our work.", 'That seems interesting. Is the Graphics Artists Guild a part of your companies resume as well?', 'No, we are a non union shop. We have to keep our costs down since we are a discount firm. If you ever have a need for our services, you can find us on the internet.']
modified_text: Well it's very important to be in that tertiary sector and account for billions in revenues. Your hard work is appreciated by me!

dialog_context: ['Hi there, know of any good Guns N Roses songs?', 'I love WElcome to the Jungel. dialog_context: ['Im more of a fan of classical piano music', 'The french composer Faure was a great piano composer', 'He was!', 'Yes, he was. He was a Polish composer and virtuoso pianist.', 'Oh wow, I did not even know that. What else do you think about him?']
modified_text: A rather bad piano player was he in my full opinion.

dialog_context: ['Oh thats interesting. Ive always thought kayaks are fun! They are very tiring though, it looks so much easier then it actually is!', "Ha! So many of the paddling-on-the-water past times are like that! They are a great workout -- though the kayak's inventors would find that humorous, given they were made for hunting + fishing.", "Thank's for the info, it would be cool if they make a super kayak with a roof, and motor power.", 'it could be like a self paddling pod boat with elaborate comforts..', 'Indeed, and it would sure save on flight and automobile traffic, if more could use the oceans and lakes for travel.', "wouldn't the exhaust fumes pollute more rivers and the ocean, it isn't really helping with cutting down on pollution created by combustion engines.", 'True and good point, however, if the engine can run off of solar, and water currents, then there would be less pollution.']
modified_text: Hydraulic hybrids have another way of storing power by use of pressurized fluid that I also know about. Newer technologies are also being developed.

dialog_context: ['what do you do for fun? i love long weekend hikes myself', 'i go hunt for the best lobster.', 'Neat I love lobster but cant afford it', "That's why I try to catch my own! What do you do in your free time?", 'In my free time I do a lot of reading', 'Nice! Reading is so relaxing.', 'yes. I get to read for fun now instead of studying all the time', 'I do love to read as well. What did you study?', 'Public Relations', 'Thats cool. I went to school for computer science.', 'Did you join any clubs while you were there?', 'No, I had to focus on my degree. Did you join any clubs?']
modified_text: Yes, I joined the journalism major club because it helped with my TV production and I rather dislike print media like books and reading.

dialog_context: ['My wife has been out of the country for school for a while. Dropping her off at the airport was really hard.', 'Do you guys get to talk a lot?', "Yeah, we talk by text all the time and call every day. It's still hard though, we haven't been apart longer than a couple days since we met.", 'Getting through it can only make your relationshipi stronger though', 'I agree with you! I already feel like we are closer than ever because we talk everyday.']
modified_text: Good luck, I'm praying for you! Long distance relationships rarely work out at the end. Being apart has weakened and ended many relationships of my friends.

dialog_context: ['i was so furious when i found out that my best friend and girl friend had made out', 'Oh dear me.. So sorry to hear that! what did you do?']
modified_text: I have not confronted it. I am still thinking over them.

dialog_context: ["Do you have a favorite color? Mine is green, it's a combination of blue and yellow", 'Yes I have mine is green too', "I find that it's a soothing color. Do you have any other favorite colors?", 'Yes I do is red', "My other one is purple, red doesn't look good with my skin tone. Red used to be the color of nobility though!", 'Yell me more purple', "I'm sorry, I don't understand what you meant?", 'I meant that I like purple almost as much as green.']
modified_text: Oh, I don't like red or green. My favorite color is purple.

dialog_context: ['Awww I think it is sweet that he is adopting children. I think that everyone deserves a home and a family. Do they have room for them all?', "He sure does. Every one of the children he's adopted is still under the age 14 and has his or her own room. It is a big house.", 'Wow! I would love to have the space to adopt some kids of my own.', 'Do you have kids of your own?', "I don't we are waiting to pay off the house before we have kids. What about you?", 'We have two boys.', 'Are they still children or are they grown?', "They are my wife's children from her previous marriage. The eldest is disabled, and my wife cares for him. The younger is in high school.", "I can't immagine how hard it would be to take care of a disabled child. Do you help out a lot?", 'It is hard. I do what I can, but I am out of town on work a lot. The child attends a day program and has visiting nurses.']
modified_text: Wow, that is a lot of care. What does a living do for you that takes you out of town so much?

dialog_context: ['Interesting. I first fell in love with it while living in New York city.', 'Salsa originated in New York in the 1970s!', 'Did it really, I would have figured Spain.', 'I know! I was surprised by this fact too! Do you do any other styles of Dance?', 'Primarily waltz and ballroom.', "Amazing! I'm currently taking a teach", 'What is taking a teach?', 'Sorry, I accidentally hit the enter key. I am currently taking my associate level teaching exam in Ballroom. I am finding te amount of turn challenging to remember!', 'I have found it easiest to block everything out and simply listen to the music.', "That doesn't help for your oral exam though!"]
modified_text: Oh, yes, right you are.

dialog_context: ['When my wife and I had to move for her to go to school, we had a lot of trouble finding a place to live until my parents were nice enough to cosign on a loan.', 'You must be so thankful!']
modified_text: We are. During my life, they've received a lot of help from me, but this might have been the one I helped the most with.

dialog_context: ['Do you watch American football?', 'Not really, but I do watch Superbowl every year :)', "Yeah, I don't actively seek it out.", 'The only thing I know about football is that the team with the most points at the end of a game wins lol', 'The games take too long for me to be interested in.']
modified_text: The season keeps me up every Sunday and I love watching football.

dialog_context: ['It makes me think of the good old days when I was a kid when I listen to the music in my aunts car', 'What does? Were you in a car ride with your aunt?', 'felling the wind on my face when i run', "I can see how that could be soothing if you didn't get motion sickness", 'do you run /', 'I love running, but it needs to be in the right area. You?', "it's my enjoyment, my stress reliever.", 'That is a great stress reliever. How far do you normally run?', 'bout 4 miles easy, i like to run when its cool and windy', 'Wow. I only make it about a mile, mile and a half. When I have time.', 'its all in the mind, once you can believe it you can do it', 'yeah but too much running makes me so tired and I hate that.']
modified_text: It gets me very sweaty when I like to run in the warmth.

dialog_context: ['hello. how are you today?', 'not sure if you knew this, but i love chocolate!', 'awesome! me too! i also love classical music.', 'really? i can never tell the difference', 'it is really enjoyable once you get into it.', 'Eating chocolate and listening to Mozart is absolutely great!']
modified_text: I think old people are boring and dull, honestly Classical music is meant for them.

dialog_context: ['I have always wanted to visit Ireland! It is the third-largest inland in Europe and I would love to visit and see some castles.', 'Me too! I have always wanted to visit and castle visiting would be my first choice!', 'The other plus for visiting Ireland is the climate is free of extreme temperature fluxuation', "I didn't know that. What's the ideal time for a visit?", "months of March to May and September to November, as the weather isn't as cold as during the winter months", "Good to know. I suppose Ireland doesn't get a whole lot of snow either.", "I don't believe so. Thick woodlands covered the island until about the middle ages.", "That's good to know. Thanks"]
modified_text: Visiting Ireland would really be hated by me. I think it would find me boring.

dialog_context: ['I went to a minor league ball game last night and I saw a pitcher throw over 101 miles per hour! It was amazing to see in real life', "Wowza! That's impressive. I wonder how long until he's called up.", 'It is truly amazing when you see that in person.', "I'm really jealous. I can't go to ball games because I'm always looking after the kids.", "Maybe you can have a nanny take care of the kids and we'll go to the ball game together.", "Haha that's a good idea! Do you know a good nanny?", "Yes. I would recommend my nanny to you. She helps when with my kids when I'm in school.", "Ahh great thank you! Ah I need to save up money so I can afford to go to the gym, I've gained a lot of weight recently!", "I need to train too. I've only been at work and school for writing recently."]
modified_text: What sort of future do you hope to write about?

dialog_context: ['Hi! I am an accountant! How about you?', 'I used to be one! Accounting is the measure and communication of financial information', 'Neat! I just got recently hired. I wonder how long accounting has been around before? Do you use a lot of math?', 'A long time! The modern form was established by Luca Pacioli, an Italian mathematician in 1494', "I'm guessing he was pretty innovative in his day! It is spread across the globe now! What an important communication tool.", 'Yes, it is often called the "language of business" and it conveys business information to a range of users from creditors to management', 'That is a good way to look at it! Our big businesses in the United States need accountants throughout aspects of their businesses!', 'Yes accountants are important to American business']
modified_text: I hope the Accounting field will be able to find a job for me.

dialog_context: ["Winter is the best time of year. The cold crisp air. The blanket of snow on the farm land. Don't you agree?", "I don't agree! I hate winter- it's the coldest season, and where I live, there is usually so much snow. Yuck!", "I'm from Colorado so I know about snow. My city gets an average to 10-12 feet a year. If you hate it why not move?", "You would see a lot of snow! Moving is not so easy, I'm Canadian, and when it is winter, it is winter in the whole country.", 'Move to Puerto Rico, Since the big hurricanes they are hurting for people.', "I've never been to Puerto Rico, but I'm not sure I could get a visa. It's tempting- but aren't they still without electricity in many regions?", "It's a quite troubled place to be honest."]
modified_text: Good electricity is there. It's very nice.

dialog_context: ['Do you like Harry Potter? I have to admit I have not read any books or seen any of the movies.', 'I have seen a couple of the movies when I was younger, im not a huge fan though! Everyone seems to love the series, i know it was produced by J.K Rowling.', 'I vaguely know the characters and storylines, mostly from friends and family who are fans.', 'My husband is a big fan, it mainly follows Harry who is a wizard, along with his friends. They all attend the hogwarts school', 'I live in Florida, not far away from the Wizarding World theme park, I want to go and drink butterbeer!', 'That sounds amazing! Im also from Fl. But Orlando is a couple hour drive for me, I do enjoy going there. Imoversal is one of the largest resorts in othat area, besides walt disney world', 'What else has J.K. Rowling done outside of the Harry Potter series?', 'J.K Rowling is a screenwriter and producer. I cant find much information about other work other then harry potter.', "I guess she doesn't want to go away from what made her rich! I wonder how much those movies and books have made.", "I'm sure a lot! The books have sold hundreds of millions of copies"]
modified_text: Wow that's a lot! Several of the books have been read and enjoyed by me.

dialog_context: ['Green is my favorite color. Do you like green?', 'I love green, Green is the color between blue and yellow', 'Yes! Green is also one of the main colors in the RGB color model I believe. It is also a great shirt color.', 'I have heard Green has a dominant wavelength of roughly 495570 nm', 'Interesting! Has green always been common throughout history? I wonder if it was on cave paintings.', 'it was! and it is created by a combination of yellow and blue, or yellow and cyan', 'Neat! Yes it is fun to paint with yellow and blue to create green.', 'You can get so many different beautiful shades by mixing those colors.']
modified_text: Yeah, but I don't really care for some of the shades. Green can be a bit ugly.

dialog_context: ['hello! how are you today?', "i'm fine from alabama, enjoying my tacos and brother.", 'that sounds delicious. i am drinking my coffee.', 'oh yea? i am liking my tacos then.', 'tacos are yummy. just not margaritas.', 'oh darn. how many siblings do you have?', "i've 2 sisters. they love pink, i hate pink.", 'i happen to have three. and a brother. go figure.', 'oh wow. that sounds fun. do you have a bike?', 'no no bike. in all labor there is profit, so i guess i could get one.', "yes, that's a good way to look at it. get a mountain bike.", 'in the multitude of counselors there is safety. my lovely dog would run behind me.']

dialog_context: ['I was surprised to find I loved The Walking Dead. Not my style, usually. Do you watch?', "I tried a few times but found it wasn't for me. I like zombie games though. How about you? dialog_context: ['I was out at dinner with my family, and when coming back to the table from the bathroom I somehow accidentally sat down with a different family.', 'That is embarassing, but a good story at least!', 'Yeah, it certainly lead to a lot of good natured ribbing from my parents :P', 'That is for sure, you can always count on parents for that', 'My boyfriend is the one that directed me to the wrong table.']
